Literature.Title: Discovery, development and optimisation of a novel frog antimicrobial peptide with combined mode of action against drug-resistant bacteria
Literature.Author: Wang J, Hu J, Pu W, Chen X, Ma C, Jiang Y, Wang T, Chen T, Shaw C, Zhou M, Wang L

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=13.68 µM,Horse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=80.77 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MBC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=4µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=8µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=16µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MBC=16µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=4µM)
